title: Front-end Coding Challenge #1
subtitle: Manage
description: The challenge aims to achieve implementing the correct HTML structure and utilizing semantic tags. Ensuring adaptability for different devices. Implementing forms correctly. Applying Flexbox and adhering to CSS best practices. Utilizing pseudo-elements and pseudo-classes. Incorporating images, icons, fonts, and backgrounds effectively.

title: Front-end Coding Challenge #2
subtitle: Task Manager
description: A classic yet effective task application where we can jot down various activities that we are interested in accomplishing. As is often the case, these tasks remain pending until they are eventually completed. Returning to the technical aspect, we have a frontend that connects to a specifically prepared API to serve as our backend. This allows us to have data persistence in our own database.

title: Front-end Coding Challenge #3
subtitle: HealthCare Web App
description: This coding challenge involves building a HealthCare Web Application using React and Vite that showcases your front-end development skills. The project focuses on creating an interactive and responsive web application related to the healthcare domain. It incorporates features such as displaying dentists' information, allowing users to contact the company, marking dentists as favorites, and switching between light and dark themes. The challenge highlights various aspects of front-end development, including state management, API integration, routing, form handling, and theming.

title: Dynamic Resume
subtitle: WebPage Resume
description: The challenge goes beyond a traditional static document. Vanilla JS was chosen to build this dynamic website. Fetch API interface was used to render the site asynchronously via get() requests retrieving individual data items from the server to update sections of a webpage. A visually appealing layout was designed using HTML and CSS. After thorough testing and optimization, the page was deployed on a hosting platform.

title: Full-stack Coding Challenge #1
subtitle: DentaCura App
description: The Dentalcura Clinic Management System is a Java-based full-stack web application utilizing Spring Boot and Jakarta EE for the backend. HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with Spring MVC, compose the frontend, while data persistence is achieved via Hibernate and JPA with an H2 database during development. This system follows RESTful architecture for seamless integration with healthcare systems.

title: Back-end Coding Challenge #1
subtitle: IdentityHub [ currently working on... ðŸ”­ ]
description: IdentityHub is a centralized authentication and authorization microservice built using Spring Security. It provides secure user authentication and authorization functionality that can be easily integrated into other projects as a central identity provider.

title: EC2-Deployer
subtitle: AWS EC2 Provisioning and Deployment
description: EC2-Deployer is a robust automation tool utilizing Ansible for streamlined provisioning and configuration of AWS EC2 instances. It facilitates secure SSH key management, efficient EC2 instance setup, and quick deployment of local web pages to the cloud, aiming to optimize and simplify AWS EC2 instance management and web hosting tasks.

title: Git'n Go
subtitle: Simplifying Git for Beginners
description: A user-friendly command-line tool designed to streamline the Git workflow. It simplifies common Git operations such as add, commit, and push, making it easier for beginners and seasoned users alike to manage their repositories with less complexity. Git-n-Go automates these tasks into a single command, enhancing productivity and making Git operations more straightforward.

title: Cloud Core
subtitle: Scalable and Secure Infrastructure Solutions
description: Cloud Core is a resilient AWS infrastructure crafted using Terraform and Ansible. It features a strategic blend of public and private subnets, ensuring optimized security and resource accessibility. Essential components such as EC2 instances, NAT Gateways, and S3 buckets are thoughtfully integrated to bolster performance, security, and scalability. This architecture epitomizes a balanced, efficient, and secure cloud environment.
